channel.title: Need Help With Downloading The Cache
channel.description:
I've been having problems downloading the cache for Moparscape. When I try to download it, I get this message in the .mpr_file_store_32 folder:
[code]You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting.[/code]
Then, I go to the link (http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip) and after I download it I extract it to c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/. But I get these messages:
[code]C:\Documents and Settings\*********\Desktop\cache.zip: Unexpected end of archive
C:\Documents and Settings\*********\Desktop\cache.zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged[/code]
And then when I run Mopar the whole thing starts over. Help please!!!!!

item.title: Need Help With Downloading The Cache
item.dc:creator: @shark_tooter shark_tooter
item.description:
@shark_tooter wrote:

Well, I found I got the same problem with my webclient… It is that the cache file is not unzipping all the way. Goto the cache file manually and unzip it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Downloading The Cache

item.description:

can somone help me with this error -.-

(Access is denied)

s denied)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)

at Update.(Update.java:34)

You lost connection while downloading a needed file.
Please download it manually from:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip
and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/
folder. Then restart MoparScape.
